item.title: The first woman programmer, Ada Lovelace
item.description:
Ada Lovelace, an Indirect and Reciprocal Influence

When I heard that Ada Lovelace Day was coming, I questioned myself, “What do I actually know about Ada Lovelace?” The sum total of my knowledge: Ada was the first woman programmer and the Department of Defense honored her contributions to computation in …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
